scripts.build-src: inlinejs -o dist/emmet.js src/emmet.js && n-copy -s src/emmet ** -d dist/emmet
scripts.build-asset: copy /y node_modules\emmet\lib\snippets.json dist\emmet\system-snippets.json && copy /y node_modules\caniuse-db\data.json dist\emmet\caniuse.json
